name: getSapHanaSystem
description: Returns a summary view of a SAP HANA system.

id.description: The ID of the SAP HANA system.

$ul: **configuredSlaDomainId**: The ID of the SLA Domain configured directly on the Rubrik object.
**configuredSlaDomainName**: The name of the SLA Domain configured directly on the Rubrik object.
**configuredSlaDomainType**: Specifies whether the SLA Domain is used for protection or retention.
**id**: The ID of the SAP HANA system.
**isConfiguredSlaDomainRetentionLocked**: Indicates whether the configured SLA Domain is Retention Locked. When this value is 'true', the configured SLA Domain is a Retention Lock SLA Domain.
**name**: The name of the Rubrik object.
**primaryClusterId**: The ID of the cluster that manages the Rubrik object.
**slaLastUpdateTime**: The UTC time when the SLA Domain was last updated.
**containerType**: The container type of the SAP HANA system. Possible values are SINGLE_CONTAINER, MULTI_CONTAINER.
**hosts**
**instanceNumber**: The instance number of the SAP HANA system.
**lastRefreshTime**: The UTC timestamp for when the SAP HANA system was last refreshed.
**numDbs**: The number of databases in the SAP HANA system.
**sid**: The SAP System Identification (SID) code for the SAP HANA system.
**sslInfo**
**encryptionProvider**: The encryption provider for the SAPA HANA system. Possible values are OPENSSL, COMMON_CRYPTO, SAP_CRYPTO.
**keyStorePath**: The path where the encryption key for the SAP HANA system is stored.
**status**: The status of the SAP HANA system.
**statusMessage**: The message associated with the current SAP HANA system status.
**systemInfo**
**hanaVersion**: The version of the SAP HANA system.
**isSystemReplicationEnabled**: Indicates whether the SAP HANA system has replication enabled.
**username**: The username of the SAP HANA system.
